data.title: Checking it OUT!
data.text:
Having lunch here before bring my soul
Mate, but where I was setting had ants so I said something to the Host, he just went on his way instead of getting me another table nor asking me would I like to sit somewhere else. Cold hearted. So there goes his tip. But the food was good

data.title: "Great Seafood for Weekend""
data.text: Great seafood selections. Crablegs are fresh and not salty, The garlic shrimp are delicious, lobsters, sushi, clams and bake mussels are excellent. They have mongolian bbq freshly made and sushi too. Good n7kver of dessert, like ice cream, egg and green tea tarts and fruits. This buffet is a place to eat when in town and a place to eat seafood on a weekend. All staffs a te friendly. Cindy our server is great and always on ton on cleaning our table.

data.title: Place to eat in Chino Hills, 35 miles East of Los Angeles
data.text:
1) Place is not fancy but the food was reasonably good. Sushi, Sashimi and other Asian (mostly Chinese) food. 
2) The place did not appear to be popular for some reason (there were very few guests on a Saturday evening). 3)3) For one thing, the price on the website was not up to date, so if you came with the understanding of what you saw on the web, the walk-in price differed (bit misleading). Although they were given some promotion discounts from a raised price and end about the same, it was still a bit confusing.
4) If you are only interested in getting plenty of food, and lots of choices, this is good place to eat, especially for week-day lunches.

data.title: Great new Chinese food buffet re-opening!
data.text: The Hong Buffet is a great continuation of the original Chino Buffet! They offer a great variety of fresh traditional Chinese dishes, some rarities and even American cuisine choices. The friendly staff is ALWAYS helpful and attentive to the diner's every need. A fully stocked sushi bar and sushi chef are ever present. Fruit, dessert, specialty and cold cut stations are also offered. Definitely bring your appetite when visiting this culinary gem, because there are so many choices, it is a bit overwhelming! Seafood lovers will be pleased at the selection offered in the seafood section. Fans of snow crab legs can enjoy them served chilled or heated by the attentive staff by request and brought directly to your table! The decor is a festive and colorful array of LED lighting and traditional Chinese design. The restaurant is very roomy and clean. Individual, couples and group dining is nicely available. The prices are very reasonable considering it is all you can eat and the endless amount of variety offered! We always have a great time here and leave extremely satisfied! You definitely must come and try out this great new buffet! You will be glad you did! We were! One last thing. The exact address for this great Chinese buffet is 2911 Chino Ave., #F1 Chino Hills, CA 91709. Try it out!

data.title: 扺食的自助餐
data.text:
一行15人中午去，每位8.69元，还奉送咖啡奶茶汽水任添。

自助餐有一百多様食品；壽司，蔬菜沙律，香港点心，义烧，台湾式炸魚炸雞，鹵肉，炒瓜菜，蒸魚，黄金蝦，蔭豉魚，炒魷魚，海瓜子，炒米粉，麻油雞，蒙古烤肉和各式甜點。二月份有八五折优惠，今天中午每位成年人才收 8.69元。

食物一般，但品种多。好友嗜鱼，蒸比目魚和蒸石班吃個不亦乐乎。
